motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • Approval of May 12, 2025 City Council Meeting Minutes • Allocation of Additional Local Maintenance and Improvement Grant (LMIG) Funds (Michael Smith)

motions.title: Funding Authorization for Sunbelt Traffic Signal Pole Replacement
motions.description: Authorization of funding for Sunbelt Traffic to replace the signal pole on the southeast corner of Perimeter Center Parkway and Hammond Drive in the amount of $90,950 plus 10% contingency.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for personnel and legal discussion.
